title: nADi-tavikkudaDi
sahitya:
nADit-tavikkudaDi en uLLam nAdit-tavikkudaDi


anupallavi

  vAdit-tuDittu mazhaimukham pArkkum sAtakam pOl enran mAdhavanai ninaindu
Anandabhairavi


caraNam 1    innamudam pozhi kuzhalUdi kanniyen manam koLLai koNDAn
 			mOhana
  caraNam 2    kUDik-kaLittup-pin konjamum dayavinri mODi sheidEgiya mukundanai ninaindu
